about_the_game:
My SEX friend and married woman, Akemi.
Tonight, I went out to play again, and I wanted to enjoy her breasts and
I want to enjoy her breasts and her sexy pubic area...

I'm going to give myself over to the pleasure of sex and get fucked and drowned.
Please watch the lasciviousness and glamour of Akemi, a married woman.

This is a novel game with no choices.

Content for adults

This game may contain content that is not intended for all age groups.
It may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace and may contain nudity and sexual content.

Contains some violent expressions.

Includes sexual assault and non-consensual expressions of sex.

The adult content will start directly.

At the end of the game, you can view the CG of the adult contents.

Some of the loading screens in the game are displayed in Japanese, but there is no problem in playing.
